TextView.android:text: This app is used for unit transfer. You can choose which kind of unit you want to transfer at the first page, which include length, area, volume, speed, tempreture and Energy. In each sub pages, you select the unit you want to transfer from and the unit you want to transfer to, input value and calculate it. You can save the transfer function to view it later, if you think that you will still use it later. From the menu of each page you can view this note and see the function you saved by select type. If you want to delete one function you just need to click it in list. And from the main page's menu you can decide how manu digit you want to save after each calculate.
